English:
Agh, got away... Sorry! Thanks for the help.
I'm Kyoko Kuremi. I'm a private detective.
Chinese:
呿，逃走了啊……哎呀，抱歉，謝謝你幫我。
我是暮海杏子，是名偵探。
Korean:
칫, 놓쳐 버렸나… 이런, 미안해, 협력 고마워
난 쿠레미 쿄코, 탐정이야
German:
Uff, er ist entkommen ... Ach, entschuldige!
Ich heiße Kyoko Kuremi und bin Privatdetektivin.

English:
I was sick for a while, so my instincts are a bit
 rusty.
Chinese: 我病才剛好呢……　所以“直覺”還有點遲鈍——
Korean: 병이 나은지 얼마 안 돼서… 좀처럼 "감"이 돌아오질 않아서 말이야―
German:
Ich war eine ganze Weile krank, also haben meine
Reflexe etwas nachgelassen.

English: What an odd thing to drink...
Chinese: 真是奇特的……與眾不同的喝法呢……
German: Das Getränk ist aber eine seltsame Mischung ...

English:
Well, each to his own. It might be really good.
Maybe I'll try it if I have the chance.
Chinese:
不，每個人的味覺本來就都不一樣……或許會意外地好喝。
有機會的話，我也想試試看呢。
Korean:
아니, 미각은 사람 나름이니… 의외로 맛있을지도 몰라
기회가 있으면, 시험해 볼게
German:
Nun ja, jedem das Seine. Vielleicht schmeckt das
ja. Eventuell probiere ich es auch mal.

English: Pardon the intrusion. I'll be on my way.
Chinese: 打擾你了……那麼，我先告辭了。
German: Entschuldige die Störung. Ich gehe dann.

English: Sorry if this seems a bit forward, but...

That was some smooth reaction time you had.
Are you used to this sort of thing?
Chinese:
以臨時反應來說，你剛剛的動作很棒呢。
你很習慣了嗎？這類的事情？
Korean:
아까 그 움직임, 좋았어… 순간적이었던 것 치고는, 말이야
익숙한 거야? 이런 일에?
German:
Du hast ja blitzschnell reagiert.
Machst du so was öfter?

English: I'm actually looking for an assistant right now.
German: Ich suche aktuell nämlich einen Hilfsdetektiv.

English: Would you consider working with me?
Chinese: 有興趣的話，要不要來我這邊工作？
Korean: 괜찮으면, 우리 사무소에서 일해 보지 않을래?
German: Könntest du dir so etwas vorstellen?
